00045    void LammpsConfigIo::read(std::istream &in)
00046    {
00047       // Calculate atomCapacity for entire simulation
00048       int atomCapacity = 0;
00049       int bondCapacity = 0;
00050       int nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00051       int speciesCapacity = 0;
00052       int iSpec, i;
00053       Species* speciesPtr;
00054       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00055          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00056          speciesCapacity = speciesPtr->capacity();
00057          atomCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nAtom();
00058          bondCapacity   += speciesCapacity*speciesPtr->nBond();
00059       }
00060 
00061 
00062       // Read and discard title line
00063       std::string       line;
00064       std::getline(in, line);
00065 
00066       // Read numbers of atoms, bonds, etc.
00067       int nAtom;
00068       int nBond;
00069       int nAngle;
00070       int nDihedral;
00071       int nImproper;
00072       in >> nAtom >> Label("atoms");
00073       in >> nBond >> Label("bonds");
00074       in >> nAngle >> Label("angles");
00075       in >> nDihedral >> Label("dihedrals");
00076       in >> nImproper >> Label("impropers");
00077   
00078       /* 
00079       * Validate nAtom and nBond
00080       * Lammps files can be read only if the number of atoms and bonds
00081       * in the lammps file exactly matches the corresponding capacities.
00082       */
00083       if (nAtom != atomCapacity) {
00084          UTIL_THROW("nAtom != atomCapacity");
00085       } 
00086       if (nBond != bondCapacity) {
00087          UTIL_THROW("nAtom != atomCapacity");
00088       } 
00089 
00090       // Read numbers of atom types, bond types, etc.
00091       int nAtomType;
00092       int nBondType;
00093       int nAngleType;
00094       int nDihedralType;
00095       int nImproperType;
00096       in >> nAtomType >> Label("atom") >> Label("types");
00097       in >> nBondType >> Label("bond") >> Label("types");
00098       in >> nAngleType >> Label("angle") >> Label("types");
00099       in >> nDihedralType >> Label("dihedral") >> Label("types");
00100       in >> nImproperType >> Label("improper") >> Label("types");
00101 
00102       if (nAtomType > simulation().nAtomType()) {
00103          UTIL_THROW("nAtomType > simulation().nAtomType()");
00104       } 
00105 
00106       // Read boundary dimensions
00107       Vector lengths;
00108       Vector min;
00109       Vector max;
00110       in >> min[0] >> max[0] >> Label("xlo") >> Label("xhi");
00111       in >> min[1] >> max[1] >> Label("ylo") >> Label("yhi");
00112       in >> min[2] >> max[2] >> Label("zlo") >> Label("zhi");
00113       lengths.subtract(max, min);
00114       boundary().setLengths(lengths);
00115 
00116       // Read particle masses (discard values)
00117       double mass;
00118       int    atomTypeId;
00119       in >> Label("Masses");
00120       for (i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00121          in >> atomTypeId >> mass;
00122       }
00123 
00124       /*
00125       * Read atomic positions
00126       *
00127       * Atom tags must appear in order, numbered from 1
00128       */
00129       in >> Label("Atoms");
00130       Molecule*                molPtr;
00131       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00132       IntVector                shift;
00133       int atomId, molId, iMol, nMolecule;
00134       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < nSpecies; ++iSpec) {
00135          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00136          nMolecule  = speciesPtr->capacity();
00137          for (iMol = 0; iMol < nMolecule; ++iMol) {
00138             molPtr = &(speciesPtr->reservoir().pop());
00139             system().addMolecule(*molPtr);
00140    
00141             if (molPtr != &system().molecule(iSpec, iMol)) {
00142                UTIL_THROW("Molecule index error");
00143             }
00144    
00145             // Read positions, shift into primary cell
00146             for (molPtr->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00147 
00148                in >> atomId >> molId >> atomTypeId;
00149                if (atomId != atomIter->id() + 1) 
00150                   UTIL_THROW("Atom tags not ordered");
00151 
00152                in >> atomIter->position();
00153  
00154                // Shift coordinates to box (0, length(i));
00155                atomIter->position() += min;
00156 
00157                in >> shift;
00158 
00159             }
00160          }
00161       }
00162 
00163       #if 0
00164       #endif
00165 
00166    }
00167 
00168 
00169    void LammpsConfigIo::write(std::ostream &out)
00170    {
00171       using std::endl;
00172 
00173       // Write first line (skipped) and a blank line.
00174       out << "LAMMPS data file" << endl;
00175       out << endl;
00176 
00177       // Count total numbers of atoms and bonds in all species.
00178       Species  *speciesPtr;
00179       int       iSpec, nMolecule;
00180       int       nAtom = 0;
00181       int       nBond = 0;
00182       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00183          speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpec);
00184          nMolecule  = system().nMolecule(iSpec);
00185          nAtom += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nAtom());
00186          nBond += nMolecule*(speciesPtr->nBond());
00187       }
00188 
00189       // Write numbers of atoms, bonds, etc.
00190       Format::setDefaultWidth(8);
00191       out << Int(nAtom) << " atoms    " << endl;
00192       out << Int(nBond) << " bonds    " << endl;
00193       out << Int(0)     << " angles   " << endl;
00194       out << Int(0)     << " dihedrals" << endl;
00195       out << Int(0)     << " impropers" << endl;
00196       out << endl;
00197 
00198       // Write numbers of atom types, bond types, etc.
00199       Format::setDefaultWidth(5);
00200       out << Int(simulation().nAtomType()) << " atom types" << endl;
00201       out << Int(simulation().nBondType()) << " bond types" << endl;
00202       out << Int(0) << " angle types" << endl;
00203       out << Int(0) << " dihedral types" << endl;
00204       out << Int(0) << " improper types" << endl;
00205       out << endl;
00206 
00207       // Write Boundary dimensions
00208       Vector lengths = boundary().lengths();
00209       Format::setDefaultWidth(15);
00210       Format::setDefaultPrecision(7);
00211       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[0]) << "  xlo xhi" << endl;
00212       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[1]) << "  ylo yhi" << endl;
00213       out << Dbl(0.0) << Dbl(lengths[2]) << "  zlo zhi" << endl;
00214       out << endl;
00215 
00216       // Write masses (all set to 1.0 for now)
00217       // lammps atom type = Simpatico atom type + 1
00218       out << "Masses" << endl;
00219       out << endl;
00220       for (int iType = 0; iType < simulation().nAtomType(); ++iType) {
00221           out << Int(iType+1, 5) << Dbl(1.0) << endl;
00222       }
00223       out << endl;
00224 
00225       // Write atomic positions
00226       // lammps atom     tag = Simpatico atom id + 1
00227       // lammps molecule id  = Simpatico molecule id + 1
00228       out << "Atoms" << endl;
00229       out << endl;
00230       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00231       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00232       int i;
00233       int shift = 0;
00234       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00235          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00236             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00237                out << Int( atomIter->id() + 1, 8 ) << Int( molIter->id() + 1, 8 );
00238                out << Int( atomIter->typeId() + 1, 5 );
00239                out << atomIter->position();
00240                for (i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00241                   out << Int(shift, 4);
00242                }
00243                out << endl;
00244             }
00245          }
00246       }
00247       out << endl;
00248 
00249       // Write bond topology
00250       out << "Bonds" << endl;
00251       out << endl;
00252       Molecule::BondIterator bondIter;
00253       int                    iBond = 1;
00254       for (iSpec=0; iSpec < simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec) {
00255          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00256             for (molIter->begin(bondIter); bondIter.notEnd(); ++bondIter) {
00257                out << Int(iBond, 8 ) << Int(bondIter->typeId() + 1, 5);
00258                out << Int(bondIter->atom(0).id() + 1, 8);
00259                out << Int(bondIter->atom(1).id() + 1, 8);
00260                out << endl;
00261                ++iBond;
00262             }
00263          }
00264       }
00265       out << endl;
00266 
00267       // Reset Format defaults to initialization values
00268       Format::initStatic();
00269    }
00270  
00271 }
